description: Tag and freeze GHOST Phase 3 — start new Phase 4 branch
notes: GOAL: Finalize Phase 3 patches and mark them immutable
MISSION: Commit validated checkpoint and prepare Phase 4 safely
CONTEXT: All summary checks, tunnel rebind, validator and daemon watchdogs now pass
SAFETY ENFORCEMENT: No Phase 4 commits allowed until this tag lands clean
to-do: Confirm patch-v3.3.14(P3.2.0) and summary are PASS
Apply final freeze commit and branch cut

setup: Verify no pending patches in CYOPS queue
verify: Ensure branch shows all prior patch tags
commit: Git commit + push tag and branch locally only (no remote sync yet)

shell: echo 'Freezing Phase 3 and locking GHOST state...'

git.commit: [FREEZE P3] Final checkpoint for GHOST Phase 3 — tunnel + daemon healthy

final.summary: ✅ Phase 3 frozen. System is healthy and synced. New branch GHOST2.0_PHASE_4 now active.

execution.onReloadHang: Move to background and resume automatically
